report.title: Warm Energy Behind Me
report.author: Eric
report.bodytext: Last night I had, and still have, a encounter with Iboga root bark powder. The amount about a spoon full, lets say 2gram. /n /n It took some time before effects entered: /n /n /n /n Woke up pretty early, feeling good and still buzzed, having the feeling I am not alone at this moment. Can feel warm energy on/behind me.
